alert.note: Alert for Mason (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:14PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gallia, southeastern Jackson and west central Mason Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 813 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gallipolis, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Rio Grande, Henderson, Adamsville, Gallopolis Ferry, Gage and Centerpoint. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
